parseGBIF 0.0.1
  • Reference

    standardize_scientificName

    standardize_scientificName.Rd

    standardize binomial name, variety, subspecies, form and hybrids, authorship to allow comparison with names of taxa in the World Checklist of Vascular Plants (WCVP) database

    standardize_scientificName(
  searchedName = "Alomia angustata (Gardner) Benth. ex Baker"
)

    Arguments

    searchedName

    scientific name, with or without author

    Value

    searchedName, standardizeName, taxonAuthors, taxonAuthors_last

    Details

    Standardize scientific name according to WCVP format. Separate generic epithet, specific epithet, variety, subspecies, form, hybrid and author, in the scientific name, if any. Standardize, according to WCVP, abbreviation of infrataxon, if any: variety to var., subspecies to subsp., FORM to f., hybrid separator separate x from the specific epithet.

    See also

    get_wcvp, checkName_wcvp

    Author

    Pablo Hendrigo Alves de Melo, Nadia Bystriakova & Alexandre Monro

    Examples

    # \donttest{
# standardize_scientificName()

help(standardize_scientificName)
#> Help on topic 'standardize_scientificName' was found in the following
#> packages:
#> 
#>   Package               Library
#>   ParsGBIF              C:/Users/Pablo
#>                       Hendrigo/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3
#>   parseGBIF             C:/Users/Pablo
#>                       Hendrigo/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3
#> 
#> 
#> Using the first match ...

standardize_scientificName('Leucanthemum ×superbum (Bergmans ex J.W.Ingram) D.H.Kent')
#> $searchedName
#> [1] "Leucanthemum ×superbum (Bergmans ex J.W.Ingram) D.H.Kent"
#> 
#> $standardizeName
#> [1] "Leucanthemum × superbum"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors
#> [1] "(Bergmans ex J.W.Ingram) D.H.Kent"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors_last
#> [1] "D.H.Kent"
#> 
standardize_scientificName('Alomia angustata (Gardner) Benth. ex Baker')
#> $searchedName
#> [1] "Alomia angustata (Gardner) Benth. ex Baker"
#> 
#> $standardizeName
#> [1] "Alomia angustata"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors
#> [1] "(Gardner) Benth. ex Baker"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors_last
#> [1] "Benth. ex Baker"
#> 
standardize_scientificName('Centaurea ×aemiliae Font Quer')
#> $searchedName
#> [1] "Centaurea ×aemiliae Font Quer"
#> 
#> $standardizeName
#> [1] "Centaurea × aemiliae"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors
#> [1] "Font Quer"
#> 
#> $taxonAuthors_last
#> [1] ""
#> 
# }
